name: Soup (Bellaedris)
description:
Prepare soups to comfort the village inhabitants, discover new soups using multiple ingredients, learn about your neighbors and become their friends!

Soup is a chill game that is all about making soup. You are an old person that just arrived in a new town. To meet new people and get to know them, you decide to make soup for them! Go to the market to buy your ingredients and prepare a delicious soup to make your guest happy!
